name: Auckland's Waitakere Estate, Heritage Boutique Collection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a lovely stay at the Waikatere Estate last week. The grounds are beautiful and the suite had an incrediable view. We were the only patrons at dinner our first night, but they served us impeccably and the food was delicious. Breakfast was excellent, as well. Although the rate was the highest we paid in New Zealand, they charged for Internet access. Other places included it for free. Still, it was a wonderful place to end our vacation.
reviews.title: Beautiful estate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could not fault this estate. The staff, the rooms, the dinning room, THE FOOD !, the location, the view, the gardens... all were immaculate and we would be proud to host overseas guests here to show off our stunning country and hospitality. yes even the driveway was an adventure !! Staff, including the chef, could not have been more friendly and helpful and efficient. Whoever the groundsmen/women are, are also to be congratulated. The estate is a credit to all involved in its running so smoothly.. Thankyou for an amazing weekend !
reviews.title: A Memorable weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are a few minor things that could made my stay exceptional but overall we had an amazing weekend away at the Waitakere Estate. As soon as we walked in we were greeted by the lovely lady at the desk who went through all the things we could do on our stay including showing us a map of all the walks, etc. We bought the rainforest retreat package so included dinner and breakfast that were both lovely and we thought we were pretty lucky to get the seats with the best view in the restaurant for both meals! The only complaints would be although we bought the package that included the bottle of bubbles on arrival we didn't receive it until we asked for it which I felt a bit uneasy about but then we had it over dinner which ended up being more convenient. The other thing was our room was next the laundry so we heard the washing machine once, but lucky it was just once! Overall I would recommend this place to anyone its a bit old but quite well kept and the views are AMAZING.
reviews.title: Loved my Romantic Weekend Away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Degustation 6 course meal was really yummy although pork belly and duck little salty.
reviews.title: Wonderful anniversary away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was quiet and warm with wonderful views over Auckland.
reviews.title: Great Service

description: Aucklands Waitakere Estate is set in a stunning rainforest setting only 30 kilometres from Auckland City and the Airport. The property is a 17 room 4 star boutique hotel with restaurant and lounge bar facilities. The hotel's ridge top setting provides magnificent views of the surrounding rainforest and of Auckland City. There are extensive bush walking options on-site and in the surrounding Waitakere Ranges Heritage Park. The spectacular West Coast beaches are also neraby.
